name: HomologicalComplex.restriction_d
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
ι' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape ι
c' : ComplexShape ι'
C : Type u_3
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
K : HomologicalComplex C c'
e : c.Embedding c'
x✝¹ x✝ : ι
⊢ Eq ((K.restriction e).d x✝¹ x✝) (K.d (e.f x✝¹) (e.f x✝))
decl:
/-- Given `K : HomologicalComplex C c'` and `e : c.Embedding c'` (satisfying `[e.IsRelIff]`),
this is the homological complex in `HomologicalComplex C c` obtained by restriction. -/
@[simps]
def restriction : HomologicalComplex C c where
  X i := K.X (e.f i)
  d _ _ := K.d _ _
  shape i j hij := K.shape _ _ (by simpa only [← e.rel_iff] using hij)

initialProofState:

K : HomologicalComplex C c'
e : c.Embedding c'
i : ι
⊢ Eq ((K.restriction e).X i) (K.X (e.f i))
decl:
/-- Given `K : HomologicalComplex C c'` and `e : c.Embedding c'` (satisfying `[e.IsRelIff]`),
this is the homological complex in `HomologicalComplex C c` obtained by restriction. -/
@[simps]
def restriction : HomologicalComplex C c where
  X i := K.X (e.f i)
  d _ _ := K.d _ _
  shape i j hij := K.shape _ _ (by simpa only [← e.rel_iff] using hij)

name: HomologicalComplex.restriction_d_eq
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
ι' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape ι
c' : ComplexShape ι'
C : Type u_3
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
K : HomologicalComplex C c'
e : c.Embedding c'
inst✝ : e.IsRelIff
i j : ι
i' j' : ι'
hi : Eq (e.f i) i'
hj : Eq (e.f j) j'
⊢ Eq ((K.restriction e).d i j) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (K.restrictionXIso e hi).hom (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (K.d i' j') (K.restrictionXIso e hj).inv))
decl:
@[reassoc]
lemma restriction_d_eq {i j : ι} {i' j' : ι'} (hi : e.f i = i') (hj : e.f j = j') :
    (K.restriction e).d i j = (K.restrictionXIso e hi).hom ≫ K.d i' j' ≫
      (K.restrictionXIso e hj).inv := by
  subst hi hj
  simp [restrictionXIso]

name: HomologicalComplex.restriction_d_eq_assoc
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
ι' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape ι
c' : ComplexShape ι'
C : Type u_3
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
K : HomologicalComplex C c'
e : c.Embedding c'
inst✝ : e.IsRelIff
i j : ι
i' j' : ι'
hi : Eq (e.f i) i'
hj : Eq (e.f j) j'
Z : C
h : Quiver.Hom ((K.restriction e).X j) Z
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp ((K.restriction e).d i j) h) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (K.restrictionXIso e hi).hom (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (K.d i' j') (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (K.restrictionXIso e hj).inv h)))
decl:
@[reassoc]
lemma restriction_d_eq {i j : ι} {i' j' : ι'} (hi : e.f i = i') (hj : e.f j = j') :
    (K.restriction e).d i j = (K.restrictionXIso e hi).hom ≫ K.d i' j' ≫
      (K.restrictionXIso e hj).inv := by
  subst hi hj
  simp [restrictionXIso]

name: HomologicalComplex.restrictionMap_f
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
ι' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape ι
c' : ComplexShape ι'
C : Type u_3
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
K L : HomologicalComplex C c'
φ : Quiver.Hom K L
e : c.Embedding c'
i : ι
⊢ Eq ((HomologicalComplex.restrictionMap φ e).f i) (φ.f (e.f i))
decl:
/-- The morphism `K.restriction e ⟶ L.restriction e` induced by a morphism `φ : K ⟶ L`. -/
@[simps]
def restrictionMap : K.restriction e ⟶ L.restriction e where
  f i := φ.f (e.f i)

name: HomologicalComplex.restrictionMap_f'_assoc
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
ι' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape ι
c' : ComplexShape ι'
C : Type u_3
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
K L : HomologicalComplex C c'
φ : Quiver.Hom K L
e : c.Embedding c'
inst✝ : e.IsRelIff
i : ι
i' : ι'
hi : Eq (e.f i) i'
Z : C
h : Quiver.Hom ((L.restriction e).X i) Z
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp ((HomologicalComplex.restrictionMap φ e).f i) h) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (K.restrictionXIso e hi).hom (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (φ.f i') (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (L.restrictionXIso e hi).inv h)))
decl:
@[reassoc]
lemma restrictionMap_f' {i : ι} {i' : ι'} (hi : e.f i = i') :
    (restrictionMap φ e).f i = (K.restrictionXIso e hi).hom ≫
      φ.f i' ≫ (L.restrictionXIso e hi).inv := by
  subst hi
  simp [restrictionXIso]

inst✝ : e.IsRelIff

name: HomologicalComplex.restrictionMap_id
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
ι' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape ι
c' : ComplexShape ι'
C : Type u_3
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
K : HomologicalComplex C c'
e : c.Embedding c'
inst✝ : e.IsRelIff
⊢ Eq (HomologicalComplex.restrictionMap (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.id K) e) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.id (K.restriction e))
decl:
@[simp]
lemma restrictionMap_id : restrictionMap (𝟙 K) e = 𝟙 _ := rfl

name: HomologicalComplex.restrictionMap_comp_assoc
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
ι' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape ι
c' : ComplexShape ι'
C : Type u_3
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
K L M : HomologicalComplex C c'
φ : Quiver.Hom K L
φ' : Quiver.Hom L M
e : c.Embedding c'
inst✝ : e.IsRelIff
Z : HomologicalComplex C c
h : Quiver.Hom (M.restriction e) Z
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (HomologicalComplex.restrictionMap (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp φ φ') e) h) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (HomologicalComplex.restrictionMap φ e) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (HomologicalComplex.restrictionMap φ' e) h))
decl:
@[simp, reassoc]
lemma restrictionMap_comp :
    restrictionMap (φ ≫ φ') e = restrictionMap φ e ≫ restrictionMap φ' e := rfl

initialProofState:

inst✝ : e.IsRelIff
⊢ Eq (HomologicalComplex.restrictionMap (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp φ φ') e) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (HomologicalComplex.restrictionMap φ e) (HomologicalComplex.restrictionMap φ' e))
decl:
@[simp, reassoc]
lemma restrictionMap_comp :
    restrictionMap (φ ≫ φ') e = restrictionMap φ e ≫ restrictionMap φ' e := rfl

name: ComplexShape.Embedding.restrictionFunctor_obj
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
ι' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape ι
c' : ComplexShape ι'
e : c.Embedding c'
C : Type u_3
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
K : HomologicalComplex C c'
⊢ Eq ((e.restrictionFunctor C).obj K) (K.restriction e)
decl:
/-- Given `e : ComplexShape.Embedding c c'`, this is the restriction
functor `HomologicalComplex C c' ⥤ HomologicalComplex C c`. -/
@[simps]
noncomputable def restrictionFunctor [HasZeroMorphisms C] :
    HomologicalComplex C c' ⥤ HomologicalComplex C c where
  obj K := K.restriction e
  map φ := HomologicalComplex.restrictionMap φ e

name: ComplexShape.Embedding.restrictionFunctor_map
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
ι' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape ι
c' : ComplexShape ι'
e : c.Embedding c'
C : Type u_3
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
X✝ Y✝ : HomologicalComplex C c'
φ : Quiver.Hom X✝ Y✝
⊢ Eq ((e.restrictionFunctor C).map φ) (HomologicalComplex.restrictionMap φ e)
decl:
/-- Given `e : ComplexShape.Embedding c c'`, this is the restriction
functor `HomologicalComplex C c' ⥤ HomologicalComplex C c`. -/
@[simps]
noncomputable def restrictionFunctor [HasZeroMorphisms C] :
    HomologicalComplex C c' ⥤ HomologicalComplex C c where
  obj K := K.restriction e
  map φ := HomologicalComplex.restrictionMap φ e

name: ComplexShape.Embedding.instPreservesZeroMorphismsHomologicalComplexRestrictionFunctor
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
ι' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape ι
c' : ComplexShape ι'
e : c.Embedding c'
C : Type u_3
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasZeroMorphisms C
⊢ (e.restrictionFunctor C).PreservesZeroMorphisms

name: ComplexShape.Embedding.instAdditiveHomologicalComplexRestrictionFunctor
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
ι' : Type u_2
c : ComplexShape ι
c' : ComplexShape ι'
e : c.Embedding c'
C : Type u_3
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_4, u_3} C
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Preadditive C
⊢ (e.restrictionFunctor C).Additive
